sketchbooks.name: Sketchbook A
sketchbooks.description: Started just before my move to Portland, this covers brief visits to Oakland, Denver and Canaan before settling in to a record of camping trips and some preparatory sketches for projects like Points of Pivot.  Finished during a trip back to Canaan in the spring of 2017.

sketchbooks.name: Sketchbook B
sketchbooks.description: AND Canaan before settling in to a record of camping trips and some preparatory sketches for projects like Points of Pivot.  Finished during a trip back to Canaan in the spring of 2017.
